description:
Nishino Tsukamu is a giant of a man who is not very bright.
During his fight with http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita] and http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] he manages to break http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]`s wrist, causing http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita] to try and "fix" it for her, cracking http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]`s wrist in the opposite direction. http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura], in anger, breaks http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]`s shin, causing the two to be at an disadvantage against Nishino. Ninshino chases the the two into one of the rooms, where http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita], while hiding, decides to use teamwork against Nishino. As a result, http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] emerges carrying http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita] on her shoulders. After using his sword to strike http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita] several times due to http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]`s inability to properly dodge while on http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura]`s shoulders, Nishino raises his sword to strike http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]`s plate but gets it stuck in the roof. http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] later smashes http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]`s forehead into Nishino`s plate, breaking it and disqualifying Nishino as well as fully breaking http://anidb.net/ch1168 [Okita]`s shin in the opposite direction, due to swinging him by his broken leg.
name: Nishino Tsukamu
